itemDesc: A shoulder-mounted heavy launcher capable of firing long-range anti-tank rockets.
A heavy anti-tank launcher designed to penetrate heavily armored vehicles.
A powerful anti-tank rocket launcher designed for infantry to engage armored targets at medium range.
A disposable anti-vehicle launcher effective at close range against armored targets.
A heavy infantry rocket launcher capable of firing high-damage rounds against vehicles.
A Colonial anti-tank rocket launcher designed to deal high damage to armored vehicles.
A heavy Warden rocket launcher optimized for long-range anti-armor engagements.
A crew-served anti-tank launcher mounted on a tripod, capable of sustained fire against armored targets.
A mounted rocket launcher designed for infantry anti-armor support and vehicle suppression.
A dual-barrel RPG launcher capable of firing successive rounds for high burst damage against armor.
A portable rocket launcher designed for infantry anti-vehicle operations.
